name: multi-platform-shopping-search
description: A Chrome extension for searching products across multiple shopping and MTG platforms

scripts.prepare-manifest: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./src/manifest.json', 'utf8')); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json', 'utf8')); manifest.version = pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync('./src/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2));"

author: DCForce
